casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Amanda Gayle REED 331A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2018 Melody R. Hairston, Special Deputy Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Reed, Amanda Gayle.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of January 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of January 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of March 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
